product_name: Patagonia Down Sweater Bunting - Infant Boys'
long_description: The light and compressible Patagonia Down Sweater bunting provides extraordinary warmth that both you and your infant boy will appreciate when the temperature drops. Wind-resistant mini ripstop polyester fabric with Durable Water Repellent treatment resists snags and moisture. High-quality 600-fill-power goose down is warm, lightweight and compressible. Spandex trim around hood, sleeves and leg cuffs helps retain heat; fold-over hand covers are designed to allow full extension for little arms. Front dual zips with windflaps allow easy on/off, and the zipper on the inside of the legs offers easy access for diaper changes. Down Sweater bunting has convertible bag-to-split-leg styling for use in a carseat or backpack. Relaxed fit accommodates layers. 100% recyclable through Patagonia's Common Threads Recycling Program-simply return your worn-out item to Patagonia.
